DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate weight loss intervention improve rheumatoid arthritis disease activity .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Assessment Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Who Changed Diet
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot 12-week RCT ( Randomized Clinical Trial ) 60 obese RA ( Rheumatoid Arthritis ) patient evaluate weight loss intervention improve PDUS ( Power Doppler Ultra Sound ) , traditional disease activity measure ( DAS28 , Disease Activity Score - 28 ) , adipokine/MBDA ( Multi-Biomarker Disease Activity ) assessment . While observational weight loss RA study , none RCTs utilize objective measure ( PDUS MBDA ) .
